thread.title: Lindsey Baldwin
thread.title_full: Servicing Stop reviewed by Lindsey Baldwin

author: Lindsey Baldwin
title: Lindsey Baldwin
text: From booking, to collection, to payment and return of vehicle it was plain sailing. I was contacted the day before to confirm pick up time and it was collected at 8am on the dot. I received a text at 10.20 to say the MOT was complete with a link for payment. The car had been returned by the time I got back from work. I'm really impressed with the service.
